task.name: interpgain
task.shortdescription: Linearly interpolate missing gain solutions, overwriting input caltable.
task.description:
This task will linearly interpolate missing gain solutions in a caltable for any antenna/spw where at least 2 valid solutions span the missing solutions. If requested, nearest extrapolation will be performed. The input caltable will be overwritten.
Only use this task if your gains exhibit phase jumps jumps less than 180 degrees between any two adjacent valid samples. This will ensure that the code to detect phase wraps won't have a bad day. Of course, your data should satisfy this anyway, or else interpolation probably won't help you!
Christopher A. Hales Version 1.0 (tested with CASA Version 4.6.0) 28 September 2016
